title: Cn mini project
content: Can any seniors out there share what to present for cn mini project using Cisco packet tracer? Which ones are best?

comments.body:
First off, why do you want to use Cisco Packet Tracer, If i may ask?  
And Second, Dont you think its better to do a coding based project for a CN project.
idt u can do a reasonable project with only cisco packet tracer
